# Getting Help

We're here to help! Here are the best ways to get support for cuttledoc.

## ğŸ“š Documentation

- **[Full Documentation](https://cuttledoc.dev)** - Complete API reference and guides
- **[README.md](../README.md)** - Quick start and overview
- **[CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)** - Development setup and guidelines
- **[DECISIONS.md](../DECISIONS.md)** - Architecture decision records

## ğŸ› Bug Reports

Found a bug? Please open an [issue](https://github.com/sebastian-software/cuttledoc/issues/new?template=bug_report.md) with:

- Clear description of the problem
- Steps to reproduce
- Expected vs actual behavior
- Environment details (OS, Node.js version, backend)
- Relevant logs or error messages

## ğŸ’¡ Feature Requests

Have an idea? We'd love to hear it! Open a [feature request](https://github.com/sebastian-software/cuttledoc/issues/new?template=feature_request.md).

## â“ Questions

- **GitHub Discussions** - For general questions and community discussions (coming soon)
- **GitHub Issues** - For specific problems or feature requests
- **Email** - For security issues: s.werner@sebastian-software.de

## ğŸ¢ Commercial Support

## ğŸ¤ Contributing

Want to help improve cuttledoc? Check out our [Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md).

## ğŸ”’ Security Issues

**Please do not** open public issues for security vulnerabilities. Instead, email **s.werner@sebastian-software.de** or see [SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md).
